description: NCFS config schema for validating `config.json` files.

CLOUDFLARE_API_KEY.description: Cloudflare API key, get it from https://dash.cloudflare.com/profile/api-tokens => Global API Key

CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN.description: You can also use API Token instead of API Key for better security

CLOUDFLARE_CNAME_RECORD_NAME.description: Cloudflare record name (server.mydomain.com), create a CNAME record in your Cloudflare dashboard and set the name to this value (you can put example.com to content for now)

CLOUDFLARE_SRV_RECORD.description: Cloudflare SRV record. Example: _minecraft._tcp.example.com for minecraft

NGROK_AUTH_TOKEN.description: ngrok auth token, get it from https://dashboard.ngrok.com/auth/your-authtoken

title: NCFS Config Schema
